name: Box apple
description:
box apple is a difficult 2D platformer about damage boosting  and precision.

you play as the box apple an apple who is also a box.

things im planning to add:

-more levels

-sounds

-better graphics

-some secrets

and more.

i hope you all enjoy the game and can tell me how to make it better.

the game is still in development anything you see and play is subject to change.
